title: Poster, "Philadelphia College of Art Pre-College Summer Art Program Announcement", ca. 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted lower left corner on left edge: Design: Stephen Geissbühler
inscribed: Imprinted in blue, lower left center below image: Art Education / Craft / Ceramics Woodworking / Jewelry / Environmental design / Fabric Design / Graphic Design / Illustration / Industrial Design / Painting / Photography and Film / Printmaking / Sculpture
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Large typographic assembly of the letters P, C, A in dark blue, ochre and gray-green.  A large photographic image of an eye dominates the C. At center, the institution name "Philadelphia College of Art" (in blue). A perforated application form is imprinted across top of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Philadelphia College of Art Pre-College Summer Art Program Announcement", ca. 1972.
ca. 1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-196.
